# clip(to:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an element-wise clip operation to the current graph.

## Declaration

```swift
func clip(to bounds: ClosedRange<Float>) -> BNNSGraph.Builder.Tensor<T>
```

## Parameters

- **bounds**: The bounds that the operations clips the values to.
